com.costsmanagerhit.model

Interface IExpenseDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExpenseDAOHibernate

    public interface IExpenseDAO
    Interface to represent the DAO object which is responsible to add/get data to/from DB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addExpense(Expense expense)
      Add the expense to DB
      Expense[] getUserExpenses(int id)
      Get All the user expenses by user id
      Expense[] getUserExpensesByMonth(java.lang.String month, int userId)
      Get the user expenses by the given month

      Get the user expenses by search by given parameters

    • Method Detail

      • addExpense

        void addExpense(Expense expense)
         throws ExpenseDAOException
        Add the expense to DB
        Parameters:
        expense - The expense object to add
        Throws:
        ExpenseDAOException - in case of error

      • getUserExpensesByMonth

        Expense[] getUserExpensesByMonth(java.lang.String month,
                                 int userId)
                          throws ExpenseDAOException
        Get the user expenses by the given month
        Parameters:
        month - expense's month
        userId - user id
        Returns:
        expenses of the required month
        Throws:
        ExpenseDAOException - in case there are no expenses

      • getUserExpensesBySearch

        Expense[] getUserExpensesBySearch(java.lang.String type,
                                  java.lang.String month,
                                  java.lang.String description,
                                  double minAmount,
                                  double maxAmount,
                                  int userId)
                           throws ExpenseDAOException
        Get the user expenses by search by given parameters
        Parameters:
        type - expense's type
        month - expense's month
        description - expense's description
        minAmount - expense's minimum amount
        maxAmount - expense's maximum amount
        userId - user id
        Returns:
        expenses filtered by search of the parameters
        Throws:
        ExpenseDAOException - in case there are no expenses

      • getUserExpenses

        Expense[] getUserExpenses(int id)
                   throws ExpenseDAOException
        Get All the user expenses by user id
        Parameters:
        id - user id
        Returns:
        all the expenses of the user
        Throws:
        ExpenseDAOException - in case the user has no expenses yet
